兟字的基本解释

兟
shēn
锐意进取。

兟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《廣韻》所臻切，平臻，生。］
(1)进。
(2)兄的别称。
(3)众多貌。参见“兟兟”。

兟字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【儿字部】　兟； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页125第21
【唐韻】【集韻】所臻切【韻會】疏臻切，?音莘。【說文】進也。从二先。又【玉篇】兟兟，衆多貌。【六書本義】與侁駪同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Guangyun" is perfected, leveled, and born. ]
(1) Enter.
(2) Another name for brother.
(3) Numerous appearances. See "兟兟".
兟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Children's Word Department] 　兟; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 125 21
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] The perfect cut [Yun Hui] The sparse perfect cut,? Yin Xin. [Said Wen] Jin Ye. From the second first. Also 【Jade articles】Six days, many appearances. [The original meaning of the six books] is the same as Qiao.
